indexer.title: Klevu Product Sync Price Indexer
indexer.description: Update products in Klevu when prices change. Ensure this is set to UPDATE BY SCHEDULE.

indexer.title: Klevu Product Sync Stock Indexer
indexer.description: Update products in Klevu when stock levels change. Ensure this is set to UPDATE BY SCHEDULE. This indexer looks at global (non-MSI) stock only. Please ensure you have the Klevu MSI module installed if you are using Magento MSI.
